message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the enthusiasm.  $120 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go right now.  Would you consider $100?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand where you're coming from, but I was really hoping to get a bit more for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $110.
